mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.motivation_ids AS "motivationIds", a.occasion_ids AS "occasionIds", a.expression_desc AS "expressionDesc", a.expression AS "expression", a.outline_template AS "outlineTemplate", a.scenario_id AS "scenarioId", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_item_category p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_item_category( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, motivation_ids, occasion_ids, expression_desc, expression, outline_template, scenario_id, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{motivationIds}, #{occasionIds}, #{expressionDesc}, #{expression}, #{outlineTemplate}, #{scenarioId}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_item_category SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, motivation_ids = #{motivationIds}, occasion_ids = #{occasionIds}, expression_desc = #{expressionDesc}, expression = #{expression}, outline_template = #{outlineTemplate}, scenario_id = #{scenarioId}, sort=#{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
